title: Elmer's Washable Glue, Colors, 5 Ounces, 4 Count, for Making Slime, 5 Oz, 4-Assorted
description: Explore endless creativity with Elmer’s Washable Color Glue. The vibrant hue of this craft glue adds a colorful touch to art projects, decorating, crafting, and more. It’s also great for creating slime with brilliant color—just mix with a few common household ingredients like baking soda and contact lens solution. Washable and nontoxic, Elmer’s glue is an easy, mess-free way to get creative. Make your glue slime and crafting creations explode with color with Elmer’s—the #1 teacher brand.
